Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> We can support large files, but I am not sure what file size should be supported by default

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <AkiraX> Let me know when I can rub the lamp

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> hax0rs can always change things, but I need to set a default that helps prevent spamming the Hush chain with huge files

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> The Hush chain is not for storing all 37 seasons of Friends in HD, we need to protect against that. Hush is for very important, small-to-medium sized files

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Since it takes many minutes of CPU time to upload megabytes, that is also a protection. It's usually going to be easier for people to upload to some other service

Not my preference, but an option

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <gigamesh> if HUSH price goes x10, does the cost of sending messages x10? obv at discretion of miners i guess, but can fees be kept stable as HUSH token price increases?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <gigamesh> @dukeleto thx for the 250,000! ðŸ˜ƒ

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> @gigamesh Hush transactions cost 0.0001 HUSH, that is fixed. We can't control or dictate the fiat price of Hush

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> if you buy a bunch of Hush, you have locked in a very cheap cost for your future private communications

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> if the price of Hush goes 10X (it's been up to $18 ish, so we have seen much more than 10X from where we are), then things cost 10X as more, in fiat

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Getting some Hush when it's super cheap is a good hedge against the future, where privacy will need to be paid for. We already live in a world where you must pay for privacy, or your data is the product being sold and making people money
